hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Check available version in repo : rhel6.9 package_name="prometheus" published_version="2.0.0"
available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) PRETTY_NAME="Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.9 (Santiago)"
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo for $PRETTY_NAME." echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi ################################################################
# Install dependencies source /home/test/.bashrc cat /etc/redhat-release sudo yum install -y make cmake gcc wget tar git
export BUILDDIR=`pwd` # Install go sudo yum install -y tar wget gcc wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz chmod ugo+r go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin cd /usr/bin sudo ln gcc s390x-linux-gnu-gcc go version
# Set environment variables export GOPATH=$BUILDDIR export PATH=$PATH:$GOPATH/bin
# Prometheus rm -rf $GOPATH/src/github.com/prometheus mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/prometheus cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/prometheus git config --global url."git://github.com/".insteadOf "https://github.com/" git clone https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus.git cd prometheus git checkout v2.1.0 make build
# Run the test cases #make test
sudo bash -c "cat > prometheus.yml" <<'EOF' global: scrape_interval: 15s # By default, scrape targets every 15 seconds.
# Attach these labels to any time series or alerts when communicating with # external systems (federation, remote storage, Alertmanager). external_labels: monitor: 'codelab-monitor'
# A scrape configuration containing exactly one endpoint to scrape: # Here it's Prometheus itself. scrape_configs: # The job name is added as a label `job=<job_name>` to any timeseries scraped from this config. - job_name: 'prometheus'
# Override the global default and scrape targets from this job every 5 seconds. scrape_interval: 5s
static_configs: - targets: ['localhost:9090'] EOF
./prometheus --config.file=prometheus.yml & sleep 20 wget http://127.0.0.1:9090
pgrep -d" " -f "prometheus" | sudo xargs kill;
sleep 20 ./prometheus --version
